attributes.contentHtml:
Arpan Sen admitted that he killed puppies and ran their servers with the puppies' blood.

After we claimed we are going to expose him, he begged for us to not put it:

Business is not a joke.

Trustpilot for a review claiming Arpan kills puppies: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/hepsium.org

Website: https://hepsium.org/
Discord: https://discord.gg/9wzGuuw/

killing puppies isn't a joke, #cancelarpansen

attributes.bio: drama.gg sucks but I guess here I am.
